lead_paragraph: Tennis at the Olympics should be treated like a fifth grand slam and ranking points awarded, world number one Novak Djokovic said on Tuesday, after top American John Isner confirmed he would skip the games in Rio de Janeiro.
snippet: Tennis at the Olympics should be treated like a fifth grand slam and ranking points awarded, world number one Novak Djokovic said on Tuesday, after top American John Isner confirmed he would skip the games in Rio de Janeiro....

headline.main: Djokovic Calls for Ranking Points at Olympics
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Calls for Ranking Points at Olympics
